forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn casts its gentle glow over Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens to a temperate embrace, with a hint of morning drizzle lingering in the air until the clock strikes five. The night carries a whisper of clouds, softly swaying against a backdrop of cool air, cloaked in the familiar chill of the West. Winds, playful yet resolute, weave through the city at a moderate pace, sending the scent of the sea mingling with that of fresh pavement.

The sun will triumphantly break through the clouds as the day unfolds, gradually warming the landscape and revealing the vibrancy of a city alive with activity. Anticipate a high near 65, enticing you outdoors while the golden rays beckon for a stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a leisurely coffee pause in one of the local cafés. With gusts picking up through the afternoon, it's wise to layer your attire—a lightweight jacket or a breezy sweater will shield you from the playful wind as you traverse the city's enchanting streets.

As the fog retreats, the iconic vista of the Golden Gate Bridge will emerge, inviting exploration of its beauty from nearly every corner of the city. Today is one for quiet moments, perhaps indulging in a visit to a nearby park or enjoying the quiet embrace of nature in the Presidio. The weather offers a canvas painted with calm and clarity, perfect for a stroll or a thoughtful pause, as the essence of San Francisco reveals itself anew.
